p: Negative correlations were observed between all three entomological indices with current month wind speed in all study and control areas. These correlations were significant in Akbar Town study area for all three entomological indices of Ae. albopictus. Moreover, both HI and BI of both species demonstrated positive correlation with two months and three months previous wind speed and these correlations were significant in 3 rd Kurana study area. Futher, similar significant positive correlations were observed between three months previous wnd speed and HI and BI of Ae. aegypti in Eriyawetiya study area.
